title: Bizarre "Mind Control" Angle In Car Incident At NSA Ajit Doval's Home - NDTV
content:

description: The man caught trying to drive into National Security Advisor (NSA) Ajit Doval's home in Delhi on Wednesday has provided a bizarre explanation for his act, prompting the Delhi Police to investigate his mental stability, sources have told NDTV.
